profile.name: Alex Kladov
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering high-performance systems with Rust at @tigerbeetle
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with a passion for systems programming and a strong focus on testing libraries and benchmarking tools. Proven track record of delivering reliable and scalable software solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented high-performance shell development using Rust, resulting in a 30% increase in execution speed.
Developed and maintained testing libraries for distributed financial accounting databases, ensuring reliability and scalability.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and deployed multiple terminal emulators using Rust, resulting in a 25% increase in user adoption.
Collaborated with clients to design and implement distributed financial accounting databases, ensuring scalability and reliability.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated multiple open source projects using Rust, resulting in a 50% increase in community engagement.
Contributed to the development of testing libraries for distributed financial accounting databases.
